fields.description:
Text font size changes while rotating a view from 0 to 45 degrees.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Download and import the attached app.
2. Launch the app.
3. Click on blue box with text 'MENU' on it.

Actual:
The size of the text changes while rotation whereas the size of the box remains same.

Expected:
The size of the text should be same.
fields.summary: Android: Animation - Text font size changes while rotating a view from 0 to 45 degrees
